txt.en: 'This door must be controlled by some sort of mechanism. We should look around and see what we can find.'
'Well then. I knew I smelled something fishy from him. Whatever he took from here...'
'I'm afraid it may have severe consequences in the future. What is done is done. We shall make preparations.'
'We have new things to play with!'
'We love to play with new things!'
'Hmmm. This is odd. It seems our alchemist was more paranoid than we gave credit.'
You must have completed 'Discovery: Carn DÃ»m' by travelling to Bail Avarc in Angmar to play this instance.
'Well done! I couldn't have asked for a finer escort. Strong! Stalwart! Yet a fool all the same.'
'You might have guessed by now that I'm not here to cure any illnesses.'
'This, Bile of Ifrinn, is surely more valuable to my cohorts. Alas, I must away!'
'Right. I'll go find a safe spot to hide. Once you've cleared the path, I shall rejoin you.'
'This is not what I was expecting. The answer to what ails us must be protected by those... things!'
